metadata.title: CVE-2019-8322 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in RubyGems 2.6 and later through 3.0.2. The gemowner command outputs the contents of the API response directly to stdout.Therefore, if the response is crafted, escape sequence injection may occur.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-8322` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

jruby - 9.1.17.0-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jruby package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '9.1.17.0-3').
